website_summaries.verdict: This quesadilla maker is basic and frill-free, but is easy to use and affordable.
pros: A top seller by a popular brand
Heats up quickly and prepares quesadillas in as little as 5 minutes
Nonstick surface wipes clean with minimal effort
cons: Latch on the lid is prone to breaking with repeated use
Won't accommodate  overstuffed or large quesadillas

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Quesadilla Maker!
customer_reviews.text: I am pretty impressed with the nice crisp Quesadilla that comes out of this little machine. I would definitely recommend it if you have the counter room. Yum! I would say the first time you use it make sure to clean it very well, it has a little burn off smell when you first turn it on, I would assume you might need to pitch the first thing you make on it if you have not cleaned it really well.
customer_reviews.author: P Miller

customer_reviews.title: works beautifully..
customer_reviews.text: works beautifully....i read reviews before buying so was cautious when locking lid...press down on bumpy spot on lid like 20 seconds so you know the top and bottom are completely as far as they will go...be patient then gently lock latch...if you have to force DON'T...just wait a few more seconds while applying pressure. after latched then 2.5 minutes!
customer_reviews.author: svsutej

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Everybody should have one of these. It makes the perfect quesadilla of any kind in minutes. You can use one tortilla shell and fold it over or use two. Clean-up is a cinch with either a wipe or a short soak with vinegar, then a wipe. The nonstick material does seem to be thin so make sure you don't scrape it hard even with a gentle spatula. I just douse it with a little oil prior to use if I"m concerned about any sticking, and that has worked great so far. I use this thing multiple times a day.
customer_reviews.author: ScribeCentral

customer_reviews.title: We don't ever put it away.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for my kids for Christmas. They liked it so much, I bought one for me. Their daughter liked it so well, she bought one. My friend liked mine also, so I bought her one. I am going to be known as the "Quesadilla Lady". The latch is fragile. Just don't mess with it. Use the rubber pad on top to close it. The latch will catch itself. Very versatile and a real time saver in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Jaci44

customer_reviews.title: This is the most dangerous item in my kitchen!!
customer_reviews.text: I do a lunch program at my church, during the summer, for our community kids. I ordered this thinking the kids would like this as a lunch item. This machine is so dangerous to use even for an adult because the whole machine gets so hot!!!! There is only one place you can even touch the outside and that is the small handle on the front!!!! I won't be using this ever - it gets too hot even for an adult to use!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great machine! I was buying frozen fix for my work lunches and even frozen quesadillas. They were seal, frozen and processed! Today I made my first homemade quesadilla with chicken, cheese and veggies and my husband and I LOVED it! You put tortilla on, then filling, then another tortilla and close it. The lid locks closed and it’s done in 2-3 mins! I used my kitchen scissors and whaalaaa
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea ❤️

customer_reviews.title: Does what it Says
customer_reviews.text: We have used it about 5 times so far and I am very impressed. Easy to use and wipe afterwards. the cooking surface is none stick, but the shell has gaps between the cooking surface. If you over spill might be a bit hard to clean up when liquid seeps into it from around the cooking surface edges making it hard to properly clean.
customer_reviews.author: InvKevin

customer_reviews.title: Returned to Amazon Warehouse - Not as advertised and broken
customer_reviews.text: Sold as opened like new product but when product arrived, box was resealed with household "paper" tape like you use when wrapping a present. Upon opening, the locking latch was broken' plus, missing the all important hinge pin. Also, the attached with adhesive rubber heat resistant safety pad was off center and peeling off. Sorely disappointed and I find it questionable that proper inspection of the returned Quesadilla Maker actually happened. Still motivated to buy a Quesadilla maker but this has been a subpar experience.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen appliance
customer_reviews.text: Great quesadilla maker. Incredibly easy to use and fairly easy to clean. I've been getting creative with the fillings.. I haven't made a bad quesadilla yet! I let it go for 7 minutes (slightly longer for low carb tortillas) and it comes out hot and crunchy. I let it cool slightly on a wire rack so it gets even crunchier. I find myself using this at least 3 times a week. It makes weeknight meals very simple and quick to prepare.
customer_reviews.author: Steve G

customer_reviews.title: Fun to use!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to make quesadillas. I do have problems getting the top to brown perfectly but I'll get there with practice. Best way to separate the sections is a good pair of kitchen shears. Don't put too much on the bottom one or you won't be able to close the lid and the stuff will leak out into the groove.
customer_reviews.author: Pat J.

customer_reviews.title: Fast and Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: perfect for a quick snack! Takes about 3 minutes and the Quesadillas are perfectly brown and slightly crispy. I love that it's made into little pockets (the cheese seals all the sides!). I send my toddler off to school (day care) off with an easy meal and my husband loves making quesadillas for snacks. I will have to try to make an omelette in this...
customer_reviews.author: whereisheather

customer_reviews.title: Not enough
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't allow for any sort of thickness. I'm talking it won't close if you put in enough cheese for it to be anything more than a cracker outcome. Maybe I bought the wrong size, but we haven't used it more than a couple times because it didn't produce the outcome we were hoping.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots a fun even with the delicious mistakes..
customer_reviews.text: It does a good job all around. As long as you don’t over stuff your tortillas too much it does well. Of course you will overstuff and need to improvise as you would not be able to latch the lid. You simply improvise with your hand and sort of guesstimate the cooking time which takes practice. It’s real hard to “ mess up” so even the mistakes are delicious and fun. Ya gotta try this, it’s fun AND delicious at the same time..
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Who's hungry?
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these years ago that my daughters and I use several times a week as they were really into cheese quesadillas this one is much better because the top doesn't fall down and slam shut like the old one did I really like that it has ridges for better grip as well this one was a bit smaller than the original one that I had but it definitely works well.
customer_reviews.author: Momma Mia

customer_reviews.title: Two Tortillas
customer_reviews.text: Just a reminder to everyone that in general you would want to use two tortillas at all times when using this. One on bottom, then one on top. And maybe you are reading this and thinking “how can anyone not know this?” Well, check with my husband. However if you are into open faced buffalo chicken quesadillas, just know this will stand the test for that too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than a stove
customer_reviews.text: had one of these in my house growing up and remember using it very often. I decided to get my own and was very excited for the delicious, crispy triangles which topped any quesadilla I have ever had. I told some friends and they made fun of me when I said I bought a quesadilla maker. They go, “so you bought a stove?” But my boyfriend can vouch for how many times I have proven this machine to be useful. I really like this machine it does a good job of sealing the cheese in and getting crispy! The quesadillas are very delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: One of the hinges broke immediately
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this quesadilla maker for my husband while he was working out of town. I was highly disappointed that part of the fastener to close the quesadilla maker had broken immediately with first use. We did not overfill the tortillas, and it is difficult to keep closed. It is a little smaller, so be sure to look it over before purchasing tortillas and cut meats into smaller cubes/slices. This product does make decent quesadillas.
customer_reviews.author: M. Childress

customer_reviews.title: Love this quesadilla maker
customer_reviews.text: I love this quesadilla maker! It's the smaller size one so you'd use the small tortillas but I'm ok with it, it's perfect size for my family of 3! So easy to clean and easy to use, highly recommend this quesadilla maker, you can make dinners all the way to breakfast quesadilla with eggs and sausage!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great gift just a little on the small side
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my mom for her birthday and she loved it ! It makes it very easy to make homemade quesadillas ! The only thing I think someone should be aware before buying is the size of the machine. It’s grest for making personal quesadillas you just have to buy the regular burrito shells
customer_reviews.author: Giana Kirkland

customer_reviews.title: For taco sized tortillas!
customer_reviews.text: I was smaller than I expected. I didn't read the description very well. It's actually for a smaller taco-sized tortilla. My old one was for a burrito-sized, so it took a lot more to feed my family and longer to make them. Overall it works very well. It is a little hard to clean. Cheese overflows into the crack between the burner and plastic cover and basically impossible to get out. But we love quesadillas so I give it 4 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New purchase and loving it
customer_reviews.text: Just bought and used twice. Very easy to use and clean. Latch is a little loose when storing but latches firm during cooking with the food in it. Directions were easy and food turned out great! Upright storage is perfect for my cabinet as well.
customer_reviews.author: VashtiRP

customer_reviews.title: Pressing Matters
customer_reviews.text: This pseudo waffle press designed for quesadillas does the job well, but the handle easily snaps off when applying the customary pressure required to flatten two tortillas. I used homespun ingenuity to properly affix the handle, but not everyone will take the time and effort nor have the resources to do this. Nor should they, as a product should be properly designed to withstand the very same operations it requires. This appliance makes great quesadillas, but also headaches.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Lucky

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: My kids LOVE quesadillas and this little machine has saved me a ton of time in the kitchen. It's super easy to use and we get perfectly cooked quesadillas in about 3 minutes. If you overfill the tortillas you will get a bit of cheese oozing out the sides, but it's an easy clean up if you get it while its warm! Some of the crevices can be a bit harder to clean if you let the fillings dry onto the plates, but a toothpick will "dig' out most of the dried one cheese pretty easily. Overall, I'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: Loved it- but don't overfill
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as gift for a White Elephant office Christmas party. It was a hit! The person who recieved it has used it several times and raves about it- as long as you don't overfill it. (Evidently there was an incident with too much cheese melting out of the machine.) One you get the filling to bread ratio down it makes delicious quesadillas- or so I'm told. Tempted to buy one for myself after hearing her talk about it!
customer_reviews.author: K.McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Would buy as a gift. My daughter LOVES it. Very easy & quick to use. A little hard to clean when the cheese spills over into the crevices.... not 100% sure if I am really getting it all out from under and between & can't see where you can lift up the actual black part to get underneath. But I still love it.
customer_reviews.author: EC

customer_reviews.title: This thing is pretty great. Just plug it in and it's ready ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is pretty great. Just plug it in and it's ready to go in no time. Heats up food quick too. Quality seems a tad cheap and if you put anything more than cheese in your quesadilla the latch probably wont close unless you force it. It still works with the latch open though so it's not a huge deal. Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Hodgekaze

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: This quesadilla maker is very good. However, you can’t add many ingredients to it. The excess will exit the sides and make a mess. Cheese quesadillas are about all we use it for, but they are delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Luvzit

customer_reviews.title: Restaurant style Quesadillas
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my daughter for her birthday (she is a quesadilla fiend) We must overfill our quesadillas because we can't get the lid to lock down but it still works fine. The top of the unit has an area that stays cool so you can press down as needed. It cleans up really easily. I store it upright but it is still a little bulky. We still have to use a pizza slicer to cut the quesadilla sections apart but that is no biggy. Some interesting recipes came with the little how to booklet. :-) It is a fun little machine for the money - I would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Elsie Jaussaud

customer_reviews.title: Great Quesadilla maker!
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a well used Sante Fe model. This one is smaller but worked great. Frankly, the 10" flour tortillas make a big meal. Used 8 inch in this model, with the edge well sealed (about 3/4 of an inch). Will try 6 inch to see how they do. Looking forward to using again, was very pleased with results. My only caution is, there is not a dripping tray..after each quesadilla, I had to take a paper towel and clean channel around the heating plate. Not a big deal...but careful-it is hot!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy E.

customer_reviews.title: Nice improvement
customer_reviews.text: Great improvement over their previous model. This product is easy to clean and easy to use. I’m sure the latch will fail at some point but with a bit of easy handling it should last longer than the previous iteration.
customer_reviews.author: MarkB

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use...gets veryyyyy hot be careful...Great quesdilla evey time
customer_reviews.text: Luv this machhine... I get the 8inch tortillas they work perfect...they seal up nicely around edges you just have to finish the cut...has some cheese leakage but so easy to wipe out...do not force lock...if you over stuff just keep pushing down slowly it will lock!!! We tried cheese...egg & cheese...pb& j Everything has been great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Suzi

customer_reviews.title: Makes Really Good Quesadillas
customer_reviews.text: So far this has worked really well for us. I spray a little bit of oil to try and make them as crisp as possible. I wish the outer edge was as crispy as the center area, but they do taste good. Added on 2/1/20: I’ve had this a few years and it still works very well. I used it to make quesadillas for my father, sister and bro-in-law. My father (aged 91) had no idea what quesadillas are, but all agreed they were delicious. I do love this appliance and plan on buying one for my sister as a gift. I see I have to buy it through a secondary seller. Not sure why that is the case.
customer_reviews.author: E in Webster

customer_reviews.title: Great idea in theory...
customer_reviews.text: I like this product, but I wish it was bigger. The first time I made a quesadilla in it, a large amount of the cheese oozed out of the tortillas and down onto my kitchen counter! It doesn't hold much inside of the tortillas without spilling. You have to make sure to use smaller tortillas as well. Honestly, I have only used it a couple times and it is just easier to use a stove top and skillet. I would've returned it if we hadn't used it.
customer_reviews.author: courtney

customer_reviews.title: Came broken, doesn’t fit much inside
customer_reviews.text: It came broken. Not a big deal, just a small piece broken off, it was still functional. Pretty small and doesn’t fit much cheese inside a quesadilla, and barely any fillings if you want other stuff in there. I used to have one of these I bought from a local grocery store and it was way bigger. Couldn’t find one like that on amazon so I was hoping this was a close replacement, nope.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Wolter

customer_reviews.title: I use this almost everyday, must have if you have kids.
customer_reviews.text: This cooks quesadillas great and very quick and heats up in less than 3 minutes. I also use it to make grilled cheese sandwiches and it does a killer job and so easy to do. Clean up is a breeze, nonstick so just a clean wash cloth real quick and done.
customer_reviews.author: Airiq Canna

customer_reviews.title: Quick dinners!
customer_reviews.text: We had one of these many years ago and used it all the time. I used to make broccoli and cheese quesadillas and chicken quesadillas, so I decided to buy another one. It’s incredibly easy to use and fairly easy to clean. The kids thought it was neat.
customer_reviews.author: B. Mentel

customer_reviews.title: Great value, easy cleanup... cooking size could be better.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this to make breakfast and chicken quesadillas. Would be a 5 star review but for two things: 1. cooking area not deep enough (was a little difficult to do chicken quesadillas). 2. Interior cooking circle is small for size of the machine itself, which helps with cleanup, but leaves edges of quesadillas with no filling.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: The King of Quesadilla Makers!
customer_reviews.text: The King of Quesadilla Makers! This item works like a charm! We use it very frequently. I initially bought as a "joke" for my youngest daughter who is a huge quesadilla fan and she would try to make them on a small grill appliance. After we used this the first time and saw how easy and well it worked, we were hooked. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Holly L

customer_reviews.title: A fun way to make home quesadillas!
customer_reviews.text: Teaching my niece too cook and she likes quesadillas. The cooker makes it easy to make individualized meals and makes it fun. Easy to use and to clean up. It could cook a little faster, but it is not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew O. Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Heads up though, this is for smaller tortillas. Taco-sized tortillas. If you want something that takes on burrito-sized tortillas, this isn’t it.
customer_reviews.author: Noelle

customer_reviews.title: Love. Love . Love
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this. Since I got it for Mothers day we use it at least once a month. So easy to clean and cooks wonderfully. If you add to much cheese it does come out the sides but easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Handle fell off
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these, one as a gift, and one to keep. Within the first few uses, the handle fell off and the screws that were holding it on seem to be stripped. It still works, but you have to use a knife to open the lid. If the handle didn’t fall off, I would have given it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: Best. Appliance. Ever.
customer_reviews.text: Love this so much. I bought 3! One for my son and one for both my husband and myself. We just can't say enough good things about them. You can make a quesadilla in 2-3 minutes. Easy to clean. Heats up fast. Doesn't take much room to store it. PERFECT!
customer_reviews.author: LWlovesmyMan

customer_reviews.title: works well but...
customer_reviews.text: don't overfill your tortillas! lol this thing is awesome! we were addicted to it for the first few weeks and wanted to use it everyday! only complaint is if you over fill it, stuff can leak into the small crevices and can be hard to clean. we ended up with ants, but this was user error. it cooks well and it super easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Marie Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, but smaller than expected. I bought this as a replacement, and although it looked the same in the photos, this is much smaller.
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: We make all kinds of stuff with this. It came with a little recipe book so we’ve made a few of those. It is very easy to clean and use. Cooks the quesadillas very fast and good.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah L

customer_reviews.title: Tip in review!
customer_reviews.text: Makes a delicious quesadilla in literally 5 minutes from plugging in to eating! The crust it leaves on the outside is basically a tortilla chip consistency and tastes really good. One big tip for everyone is use a little bigger quesadilla shell than what it recommends so it seals in the cheese and make sure you dont put the cheese all the way to the end of the quesadilla.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Ensley

customer_reviews.title: Came damaged
customer_reviews.text: The product came damaged, mounts on the top by the hinge were broken. Other than that it looked nice and the nonstick coating was in good shape. Sadly didn't get to use it because the damage and will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use, but shallow
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and very fast cooking cycle. Could use a little more depth for more stuffing. As is, it doesn't hold much filling. Even with very little filling, latch will not engage and it has to be held down for proper sealing/cooking. Overall not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Аmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: It makes a God-awful mess there's no drip pan so it goes all over your counter.
customer_reviews.author: Jenniffer

customer_reviews.title: and smells like the food that you have just cooked in it
customer_reviews.text: This quesadilla maker works relatively well. I purchased it for my husband and we both use it. However, it is very difficult to clean. Even though it is non-stick, the surface gets greasy, and smells like the food that you have just cooked in it. Normally, in this situation, you would wash it with water & dish soap. However, the instructions say that you should not get it wet. So I find myself wiping it over and over again with a damp cloth, which is very time consuming. They should have manufactured it so that the surface could be removed and washed out separately. To summarize, it works very well but takes a lot of time to clean.
customer_reviews.author: jenny s.

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: This product is of nice quality, works well, and is a fun way to make great quesadillas. I wish the grates were removable for easier cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: zippy

customer_reviews.title: Got it for my kids to use
customer_reviews.text: It works easily enough. I should have read the size description better because it 's small and it won't take the regular tortillas. It's smaller than I had wanted. I use the soft taco or fajita size with it. I make omelets quickly in it also.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Bratzel

customer_reviews.title: talk about best gift ever
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend, talk about best gift ever, he uses it all the time, it works great, we make quesadillas, different kinds of pizzas all the time. Quick easy meals, takes about 3 minutes! Definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: JessTop Contributor: Nail Polish

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made
customer_reviews.text: I had a Quesadilla maker that last about 10 years before it finally broke. So when I bought another one, this seemed to be the closest one I could find to what I had, even though it was a different brand name. I used it 3 times and the handle broke. I called the company to see if I can just get a replacement part since it would be an easy fix and apparently Hamilton Beach doesn't supply replacement parts. Lets just say it ended up in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Yulo

customer_reviews.title: Easy clean up.  Easy making quesadillas.
customer_reviews.text: It makes the quesedillas really fast. Easiest clean up. Quesedillas are on the thin side because when you lock it only hds so much. But its perfect foe me.
customer_reviews.author: Bethsci

customer_reviews.title: Don't use nonstick spray, u don't need it and it will be harder to clean
customer_reviews.text: First day I got it I made at at least 15 quesadillas, had my friends and kids over, this little thing is awesome, quick, easy to use, but don't use no stick spray, you don't need it, I learned from the crape maker I purchased, it was nonstick, but I used spray, it took me over an hour to get it off, and its still sticky. You will definitely have fun with this, the possibilities are endless
customer_reviews.author: john ceresnak

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after my first one fell and broke. I really love Mexican food and this puts a twist when it’s mexican night in my home. Easy to clean and worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Charlye

customer_reviews.title: Better Than My Other One
customer_reviews.text: Great Quesadilla maker, I have another one from a different company and it does't compare to this one. Thanks so much for offering it for sale and making it available for me to buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Doug W.

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was going to be a little bigger but it still is amazing and so happy I bought it.. we make things all the time with it now.. LOVE
customer_reviews.author: Malia Machiela

customer_reviews.title: Makes super quick snacks - love it!
customer_reviews.text: Obsessed. I love this. The double seal really does allow you to pack all your ingredients without making much of a mess. I never felt like I was going to break it when locking the lid shut. Everything tastes great in here, and I've never had any food get stuck.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: love this maker
customer_reviews.text: love this maker, about wore it out already, works great, just watch and not put too much cheese in, it will spill out the edges and the maker. Great quality and for the price, awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Janine Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Only issue is the smell of the chemicals that all not stick pans and makers have...Still has the smell after 10+ uses...I let it go through a few heat cycles with some olive oil before using it to actually cook on..just me
customer_reviews.author: Todd M

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: OMG!!! I just got my quesadilla maker, and it's amazing!!!! Works perfect. My husband is Mexican, so we have a lot of friends coming home all time and they love Mexican food. Today I tried the quesadilla maker and everyone loves it. I ordered an other one for my sister in law. Very good product!!!!😀
customer_reviews.author: yoandriph

customer_reviews.title: Hopefully a good product
customer_reviews.text: This was given in a gift exchange. I wanted it back, but the game didn't go my way. So, I don't know if it works or not.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Stone

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality hinge.
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality handle. We used it twice before the latch that keeps it shut broke. The latch hinge is made out of soft plastic. It should be metal. Other than that, we like the way it works. But without a good latch, it is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Bubb

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I hate cooking and love quesadillas so this was perfect for me. I love it and it makes really good quesadillas. It is very easy to use and clean. So glad I bought this!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Marie

customer_reviews.title: Not particularly useful
customer_reviews.text: Liked: small and easy to put away Disliked: awkward to clean, heats unevenly and can only use small tortillas
customer_reviews.author: CCD1963

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy and difficult to clean
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit about nine months ago and I used it much more than I thought I would, but not excessively, so I was very disappointed when the handle broke off. It's still usable, but I have to use a vice grip to make quesadillas now. Another complaint I have about this model is that it's hard to clean back behind the lid where the hinge is. I will look for a sturdier model is that is a bit easier to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Días Felices!
customer_reviews.text: Ok, used it 3 times - everyone loved the quesadillas. Some seem to have issues with the latch, we do not make over-stuffed quesadillas but we cannot close the latch, but do not force it either. We had a larger maker last time (10"), but the smaller ones this makes (8") are fine.
customer_reviews.author: Beach Bum

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Safe to Use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Easy to clean. Durable quality and safe to use. I like that it presses/ slightly cuts the quesadilla in equal parts beautifully making it easy to tear apart.
customer_reviews.author: K and Tembs

customer_reviews.title: Great quesadillas!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for the fiancee, and she loves it. It's easy to use, and easy to clean, and makes great quesadillas.
customer_reviews.author: Moocow0927

customer_reviews.title: Quesadilla game level up
customer_reviews.text: Where do I begin, this little magical machine is great. Yeah sure you can’t make huge quesadillas, but this saves buying two different size tortillas. Only the 8 inch ones will fit. Don’t overload with cheese a little goes a long way. I love that this machine presses the quesadilla into little cheese pillows. All you need is a pizza cutter and you are set.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Great little machine
customer_reviews.text: This hits the top of the list with recent favorite purchases. We use it like crazy. The quesadillas are quick and easy to make. The clip on the front is no longer working but it still makes quesadillas. Wish it was large enough to make taco or burrito size shells but overall really pleased.
customer_reviews.author: jenn

customer_reviews.title: Very reliable appliance. Has just enough depth to drain ...
customer_reviews.text: Very reliable appliance. Has just enough depth to drain the fat away from your quesadillas, but still cook the food through. Wish it had an on/off switch rather than powering on when plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: Matt C

customer_reviews.title: Easy and fast
customer_reviews.text: This is great for just about anyone in the family to use to make quesadillas. From kids to adults, it's simple and fast. Food comes out perfect and delicious.
customer_reviews.author: James S.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: We've only had ours a few days now but have used it twice already and really like it. It works great, is fast and is very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Tempokitty

customer_reviews.title: Makes a quick and yummy meal!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has used one of these for years and it makes really nice quesadillas...just the right amount of firmness to the tortilla! However, with the frequent use my husband gave it, the front handle did come lose, so we just replaced it after years of use. It still worked, mind you, but our son had never even opened the one we gave him and was moving to another state, so he gave it to us.
customer_reviews.author: A.D.

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but it's small
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this would be the same size as the one I've had for about 15 years, but it's not. It's small and only small tortilla shells fit in it. It works fine for making small tortillas.
customer_reviews.author: Boogiegirl

customer_reviews.title: Makes Great Quesadillas!
customer_reviews.text: We love it and make quesadillas all the time. It’s pretty easy to clean, but sometimes it is a little difficult. I also wish it came in different colours. However, other then that we are happy with it and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Teed

customer_reviews.title: Easy for the kids!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use! I wish it perforated the quesadilla more, so that its easier to tear apart. It's pretty easy to clean, its just the stubborn cheese that is melted on that's difficult to get off.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: love this. wish I paid attention to the size
customer_reviews.text: love this. wish I paid attention to the size .... the one I lost was much bigger, but now I just eat less. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: So happy I purchased this!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. I make quesadillas all the time for my family and I've always just made them in a pan and flipped them. I don't know why it took me so long to finally buy this!
customer_reviews.author: Blonderothecore

customer_reviews.title: you'll have a lot of wasted room because the part that crimps the quesadilla closed ...
customer_reviews.text: Tired of microwaving your "quesadillas"? Looking for that extra crunch? This will do the trick. It's fairly basic; the only on/off switch is pulling the plug out of the wall. And if you use large tortillas, you'll have a lot of wasted room because the part that crimps the quesadilla closed is a fairly small ring. But if you use smaller tortillas like I do, this thing is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mostly Harmless

customer_reviews.title: Works really well
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased this I wasn't very impressed. But we have had it a while now, it has impressed me more and more. We use it quite often and it has held up well and still looks almost new.
customer_reviews.author: WestUnionGuy

customer_reviews.title: The only thing I don't like is. It doesn't seal the edges good
customer_reviews.text: Does what I expected. The only thing I don't like is. It doesn't seal the edges good. Cheese will come out the side and it is cam get messy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Garner

customer_reviews.title: We love our Quesadilla Maker
customer_reviews.text: My sister came over for dinner and we made quesadillas on my quesadilla maker. She liked it so much that I bought her one. We make all different kinds of quesadillas - shredded chicken and cheese, cheese & onion, cheese, PB&J, and many more. They are fast, easy to make, and delicious. This quesadilla maker is super easy to clean and looks great on my counter.
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves quesadillas and this little handy quesadilla maker has made making his lunch a breeze. You have a perfectly crisp quesadilla in under 3 minutes. Cleaning up is super easy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: I love it! It works great
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It works great! It heats up fast and browns the quesadillas perfectly. I spray it with cooking spray first. I don't know if they brown as good without cooking spray because I haven't tried it that way.
customer_reviews.author: T & C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my kids!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so my teenagers could make them a quick snack or lunch over the summer, and they love it! It gets used every day, and they have gotten creative with their food. It's easy to use and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: Solid quesadilla maker
customer_reviews.text: Work great. It is smaller than my last quesadilla maker (it now lives with one of my daughters) and I miss not being able to use the largest flour shells, but otherwise it cooks evenly and browns nicely.
customer_reviews.author: L. Cole

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than described.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very small quesadilla maker. Never tried it and I am sending it back only due to its size. I'll give This a 5 star rating because it is not a product problem, it's a description issue.
customer_reviews.author: Hollywood

customer_reviews.title: Works well, hubby loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Great product and makes quesadillas very well. Even has a ready button so it doesn’t burn! 😊
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Makes great quesadillas ***BUT see update!!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product. Makes great quesadillas. ***Lowered to 3 stars because handle broke after 2nd use!! Cheaply made handle. As stated in first review, it does make great quesadillas but they need to upgrade the handle parts to metal. Not the brittle plastic it currently is. Still within return window, so going to exchange for a new one and see how that one holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Jason W. Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: She saw, she wanted, she ordered it, it came fast with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a quick meal!
customer_reviews.text: Makes food... Me like food, five star... *Drags knuckles out of room
customer_reviews.author: Isaac

customer_reviews.title: Best $15 I ever spent
customer_reviews.text: I use this at least three times a week. I can see where some people may have problems with the handle/locking mechanism, but if you push on the rubber piece on the lid and don't force the handle, there should be no problem. This is not meant for stuffed quesadillas, but it's perfect for regular ones. Just push down on the lid and not on the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Works good. Cooks fast for smaller tortillas; cook little longer for larger tortillas
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Brown

customer_reviews.title: Easy quesadillas
customer_reviews.text: Easy to make quesadillas. Adds a nice crunch to the tortilla
customer_reviews.author: Justin W. Rohrbaugh

customer_reviews.title: The quesadilla maker is easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: The product worked great. I am satisfied with it. I did not receive the recipes that were to be included with the product.
customer_reviews.author: G. R.

product_meta.title: Hamilton Beach 25409 Quesadilla Maker
product_meta.description: Color:RedThe Hamilton Beach Quesadilla Maker is hot and readLove Mexican restaurants but don't want to wait? Layer some cheese, beans, vegetables, or meat inside two 6" tortillas, cook in the Hamilton Beach Quesadilla Maker for a few minutes and voilá — dinner is served.
feature_bullets: Hot & ready to eat in about 5 minutes; makes 6 wedges
Satisfy your appetite for restaurant quality right at home
Locking lid for less mess & upright storage

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars2,225 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
